content: i ve designed a few keychain patterns lately but my mouse is by far the most popular when i ve shown it to people fortunately this crochet mouse keychain is very fast to make so it won t be long before i have a batch to hand out to friends and family it d make a great market day project or last minute gift and if you want to avoid clearing out your kitchen cupboards or scrubbing the bathroom this project will take about the same amount of time as these much less enjoyable tasks not that i ve been using crochet to avoid housework this week… your kit list 2 5mm crochet hook 30g dk happy place melange in gray 20g hobbii cotton silk in pink toy safe stuffing yarn needle 10mm safety eyes
